Changes the visibility of a [[HUD|HUD element]].

== Syntax ==
:<code>hud <target: target> <visible: HudVisibility> [hud_element: HudElement]</code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|target: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
:Specifies the target(s) to change the HUD element(s) visibility for.
:{{arg desc|be=player}}

{{argument|be=1|visible: HudVisibility|enum}} 
:Whether <code>hide</code> or <code>reset</code> the HUD element(s) visibility.
:Must be either <code>hide</code> or <code>reset</code>.

{{argument|be=1|hud_element: HudElement|enum}} 
:The HUD element(s).
:Must be one of <code>air_bubbles</code>, <code>all</code>, <code>armor</code>, <code>crosshair</code>, <code>health</code>, <code>horse_health</code>, <code>hotbar</code>, <code>hunger</code>, 
<code>item_text</code>, <code>paperdoll</code>, <code>progress_bar</code>, <code>status_effects</code>,<code>tooltips</code>, and <code>touch_controls</code>.

== Examples ==
*To hide all [[HUD|HUD elements]] for all players:
**<code>/hud @a hide all</code>
*To make the [[health bar]] visible again for the nearest player in [[Survival]] mode:
**<code>/hud @p[m=s] reset health</code>
